verses.verse: And <WG2547> he arose<WG450> from thence<WG2547> and cometh<WG2064> into<WG1519> the borders<WG3725> of Judaea<WG2449> and<WG1223> beyond<WG4008> the Jordan<WG2446>: and<WG2532> multitudes<WG3793> come together<WG4848> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> again<WG3825>; and<WG2532>, as<WG5613> he was wont<WG1486>, he taught<WG1321> them<WG846> again<WG3825>.
